metadata.title: Janet C. Mangini v. R. J. Reynolds Tobacco Company Et Al.; J. Douglas Weber Deposition; Tape 5 of 5.
metadata.description: Deposition of John Douglas Weber, Director of Marketing Research, in the case of Mangini v. R.J. Reynolds Company. Testimony covers R.J. Reynolds' marketing research methods.
